attributes.action: Stop the vote for Muslim girls not being able to wear veils let them wear it
attributes.background: Their is a vote going around if girls should be allowed to wear veils or not this is stupid every religion should have their freedom it is in their own religion if it was on of your religions you would feel the same this is why I want to stop the vote and let the muslim women's carry on

rejection.details: We're not sure what vote you are referring to. You could start a new petition calling on Parliament not to ban the wearing of the veil.
